TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ScriptStream extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents a stream of data. This class sends its data to either a <see cref="T:Microsoft.JScript.COMCharStream"> or a <xref:System.Console> stream.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.JScript.ScriptStream"> class.
Stores a reference to either the standard console <xref:System.Console.Error%2A> stream or a custom <xref:Microsoft.JScript.COMCharStream>.
Stores a reference to either the standard console <xref:System.Console.Out%2A> stream or a custom <xref:Microsoft.JScript.COMCharStream>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void PrintStackTrace() cil managed

Docs.summary: Writes a string that describes the current contents of the call stack. The string is written to the <see cref="F:Microsoft.JScript.ScriptStream.Out"> stream.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void PrintStackTrace(class System.Exception e) cil managed

Docs.summary: Writes a string that describes the contents of the call stack at the time the specified exception was thrown. The string is written to the <see cref="F:Microsoft.JScript.ScriptStream.Out"> stream.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void Write(string str) cil managed

Docs.param: The string to write to the stream.
Docs.summary: Writes the specified string to the stream. The string is written to the <see cref="F:Microsoft.JScript.ScriptStream.Out"> stream.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void WriteLine(string str) cil managed

Docs.param: The string to write to the stream.
Docs.summary: Writes the specified string to the stream, followed by the line terminator. The string is written to the <see cref="F:Microsoft.JScript.ScriptStream.Out"> stream.
